title: Billie Eilish, with Billie's Mom Maggie Baird!
description:
Today on a very special episode of True Story, Billie Eilish's mom, Maggie Baird, joins Tig and Cheryl to talk about the newly released Apple TV doc about her daughter and family! They talk about how Billie's fashion sense was inspired by The Groundlings, and Cheryl CRIES... about Justin Bieber? *this episode contains spoilers* (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
